referenceObject.reference: Greenberg, M. R., Huey, J. A., Framenau, V. W. & Harms, D. (2021). Three new species of mouse spider (Araneae: Actinopodidae: Missulena Walckenaer, 1805) from Western Australia, including an assessment of intraspecific variability in a widespread species from the arid biome. Arthropod Systematics & Phylogeny 79: 509-533.
